documents.title: HFCA - CCM Recipes
documents.content:
1,TRUE,"Duplicate TEMPLATE, update name of tab and change cell A1 to the new week"

2,TRUE,Delete any unused rows down the bottom

3,TRUE,"Open the Product Calendar for product-specific launches (Please note: any menu updates that will require manipulation to the sheet (labels, tags, new concepts, red flags, questions in the thread that impact upload etc.))"

4,TRUE,Check concept running for 1020 and modify under labels using dropdown

5,TRUE,"Check concept running for 1045, 1064-1066, 1082-1083 and manually enter it in the cell provided in row 3"

6,TRUE,Override the Label and Recipe Card label of slot 1044 is running a specific Discovery  (check the product calendar)

7,TRUE,"Open Slack and the #hfc_weekly_menuplanning sheet, find the post for the week you are working on"

8,TRUE,"Slot 1038 fluctuates being Veggie and not. If MP have identified it as Veggie in the slack message, then manually add the Veggie tag"

9,TRUE,Update weekly Widgets

10,TRUE,"Using PM logic, select widget recipes (+ mods!)"

11,FALSE,Select Test Kitchen and Discovery Label from dropdowns

12,TRUE,"Check the ""None"" and ""Uncategorized"" columns and update CPS where information is missing. You must do this for any future versions of the recipe as well"

13,-,You need to do this the week before menu upload so that it is ready for HC the following week

14,-,"Once HC have uploaded the menu week into CCM and before the menu is activated, you need to check each slot to ensure all the tags and labels have been added. Checkmark columns S & T during intital and final upload to verify the checks have been complete"

15,-,"When QA-ing the activated menu on live, if you spot any missing tags on the MOD counterparts (eg. Family Friendly, Spicy, Optional Spice) then you must add them to this sheet manually to ensure they will be added at T-2"

,,

'''''''''',,

Wk.,Checklist,

W02+,FALSE,Remove balanced labels from 1085-1089

(2025) W46-47,TRUE,"Winter Warmers (soups, stews, curry)"

(2025) W43-44,TRUE,The Office

(2025) W40-45,TRUE,"Adding Hello, Steak and No extra cost to 1017 & 1025"

(2025) W39-46,TRUE,Fall Flavours -- picking some fall-themed recipes to be tagged

(2025) W38-40,TRUE,Global Cuisine (manually check mark col. AR for W38-40)   -min 5 / week

(2025) W36+,TRUE,1043 to health surcharge

(2025) W36-39,TRUE,Cat & Nat partnership [please tag the recipes here]

(2025) W34+,TRUE,Health Product Line: 1085 to 1094    [Slack]

(2025) W20-35,TRUE,SUMMER (up to W35)

(2025) W18+,TRUE,"One pot / One Pan / Sheet pan: Quick & New tags| One Pot, One Pan and Sheet Pan labels"

(2025) W18-22,TRUE,Taco Fiesta

(2025) W14-17,TRUE,Earth Month

(2025) W10+,TRUE,feel-good no longer needed. Must update Protein Plus label logic to be TAG logic. Reach out to Naomi Harper if unsure

(2025) W10-13,TRUE,Family Table

(2025) W10-12,TRUE,Sugar Shack

(2025) W09,TRUE,Adjust the template to incl the additional static bestsellers

(2025) W08-09,TRUE,"Filter on dish type for things like soup, chowder, bowl, curry... and add tag dinner-bowls"

(2025) W01-05,TRUE,"Wellness recipes = all Carb Smart, Cal Smart and Protein Plus recipes, checkmark all the recipes in the sheet highlighted for protein plus manually (feel-good)"

(2025) W01-04,TRUE,One pot / One Pan tag

(2024) W48-52,TRUE,1045: Best of 2024

(2024) W45+,TRUE,Monthly Themes (3 parent slots)

(2024) W44+,TRUE,Big Batch & Tenderloin MOD national

(2024) W44-49,TRUE,1017 Perfect Pair label

(2024) W41+,TRUE,1301 & 1302 as AB & BC only surcharges

(2024) W41-42,TRUE,apply thanksgiving tag for reporting to TG slots

(2024) W36,TRUE,3 new slots for 15MM 

(2024) W36,TRUE,Static Favourites (10 parent slots)

(2024) W27+,TRUE,ON only MOD (beef tenderloin)

(2024) W26,TRUE,"15MM slots returning > ""Super Quick"" label"

"Notes: if keto meals come back, they must be tagged as carb-smart as well as have the keto label",,

documents.title: Consumer Mega-Alliance Roadmap
documents.content:
tribe,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,Capacity Planning - Optional,,,,

Tribe,Squad,Initiative,Description,Delivery month,(Workshop) Priority,(Workshop) Confidence to deliver,Delivery week,Domain Objective,KR,Squad KPI,Dependency,Product spec,Jira epic,Tribe Priority,BE,RN,Web,iOS,Android

Engagement,E06 - Inspire,Integrate Content Curation to Drive Weekly Recipe Discovery,"We believe that by launching the Discovery Hub with curated, rich content that links seamlessly to the Recipe Hub's search and filtering tools, we will effectively solve the ""inspiration paralysis"" problem for new and existing users, significantly increasing the number of users who engage with recipe content each week and establishing the app as a primary source of culinary inspiration.",Jan,,Medium ,,Ignite Daily Engagement to Fuel Our New Growth Engine,Increase daily active users to monthly active users ratio for the HelloFresh app from X% to Y%,Increase number of users who engage with recipe content each week from X to Y,Shopping Experience,,,,,,,,

Engagement,E06 - Inspire,Improve Recipe Import Experience,"We believe that by improving the import wizard flow to reduce friction, providing transparent granular error messaging for failures, and intelligently recommending a reliable HelloFresh recipe alternative when imported content is insufficient, we will significantly improve the user's initial satisfaction, build trust in the feature's reliability, and encourage continued daily use.",Jan,Medium ,High,,Ignite Daily Engagement to Fuel Our New Growth Engine,Increase daily active users to monthly active users ratio for the HelloFresh app from X% to Y%,Increase number of users who return to the Cookbook to save another recipe each week from X to Y,,,,,,,,,

Engagement,E06 - Inspire,Improve First-Time User Education,"We believe that by integrating dynamic and comprehensive tutorial content and visual onboarding (e.g., picture-in-picture guides) into the import flow, we will significantly boost user confidence and ensure a high activation rate among new users who attempt to save a recipe.",Jan,Low,High,,Ignite Daily Engagement to Fuel Our New Growth Engine,Increase daily active users to monthly active users ratio for the HelloFresh app from X% to Y%,Increase number of users who save a recipe each week from X to Y,,,,,,,,,

Engagement,E06 - Inspire,Drive Execution Utility & In-Kitchen Success,"We believe that by integrating core execution utilities—including unit conversion, nutritional information, sub-category headers, and a dedicated Cooking Mode—we will transform saved content into high-quality, actionable instructions, converting passive saving into active cooking sessions and strengthening the app's role as the indispensable in-kitchen co-pilot.",Feb,Low,Low,,Ignite Daily Engagement to Fuel Our New Growth Engine,Increase daily active users to monthly active users ratio for the HelloFresh app from X% to Y%,Increase number of users who return to the Cookbook to save another recipe each week from X to Y,,,,,,,,,

Engagement,E06 - Inspire,Streamline Cookbook Access & Awareness,"We believe that by making the Cookbook a permanent, one-click destination in the primary bottom navigation and using product update notifications to highlight its value, we will remove key navigational friction for existing users, directly leading to a significant increase in weekly Cookbook visits.",Feb,High,Medium ,,Ignite Daily Engagement to Fuel Our New Growth Engine,Increase the percentage of HelloFresh app downloads who save a recipe to their cookbook from X% to Y%,Increase number of users who visit the



as a dependency,[Q4 2025] Localization Platform Roll-out Proposal,,3,,0.5,0.5,,

Consumer Foundations,E05 - Client Platform,Snowplow,Deliver what's required to support the migraiton to Snowplow,,,,,Build a Foundation for Speed & Flexibility,,,,,,,,,,,

Loyalty & Virality,E09 - Missions,Expand Loyalty Hub Entry Points,"As part of the Information Archtiecture initiative, Loyalty will be removed from the navigation bar. Without intervention, this is expected to drastically reduce awareness, interactions, opt-ins and Loyalty Engaged User Sessions. We will invest in mitigating this impact by looking at new entry points and improved loyalty communications throughout the app experience. This will need to be done for both 2.0 and Base versions of the program, and will encompass our ringfenced 20% capacity for investing in improvements in the Base version of the program",Feb,Medium ,Medium ,,"Evolve Loyalty to Reward A Long-Lasting Relationship & Engagement, Not Just Transactions",,,Communications - High Touch/Iterable (king of the hill stuff),,,,,,,,

Loyalty & Virality,E09 - Missions,"Loyalty 2.0 MVP: Milestone 1 - Point Earning & Reward Store (""Earn & Burn"")","We believe that by offering customers the ability to both earn points on their purchases and choose their preferred rewards from a catalogue, we will  increase program clarity by helping users understand what value they are earning (program clarity score), drive higher reward redemption (reward usage %) and, ultimately lead to a stronger value perception and sustained customer ordering behavior (AOR) .",Feb,High,Medium ,,"Evolve Loyalty to Reward A Long-Lasting Relationship & Engagement, Not Just Transactions",,,,PRD : [MVP] Loyalty 2.0 -WIP,,,,,,,

Loyalty & Virality,E10 - Rewards,Loyalty 2.0 MVP: Milestone 2 - Tiers & End-to-End integration into Core User Journey,"We believe that  by introducing clear tiers with attached benefits and by further integrating the Loyalty 2.0 (Earn & Burn) program into the core user journey, we will provide stronger incentive to achieve and maintain higher tiers and boost program awareness (Opt-in rates/Satisfaction score) and engagement (LEUS), maximizing the long-term retention and ordering effect (AOR and cancellation rates).",Mar,High,Medium ,,"Evolve Loyalty to Reward A Long-Lasting Relationship & Engagement, Not Just Transactions",,,,PRD : [MVP] Loyalty 2.0 -WIP,,,,,,,
